item.title: #99: Bram Stokerâ€™s Dracula (1992)
item.description: We review Bram Stoker's Dracula (1992), from acclaimed director Francis Ford Coppola, a visually arresting, erotically charged, and boldly operatic retelling of Stoker's classic gothic horror novel that remains just as spellbinding a cinematic vision today as it was upon release. Timestamps: [00:00] Intro + The Human Target, Brave Bang Bravern, Delcious in Dungeon [36:33] Review - Bram Stoker's Dracula (1992) [2:43:05] Twitter Questions Feed: https://bladelickingthieves.wordpress.com/category/podcast/feed/

item.title: An Adventurer's Audition
item.description: Bonwyn escorts Kav to the try-outs to join Ignatius's adventuring party where she sees that another new friends has also taken an interest in the town's latest "get-rich-quick" scheme... Feed: https://feeds.megaphone.fm/dumbgeonsanddragons
